instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-5209: What is 820-5209? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-5209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fast fan
threads.message:
Arrived with fast fan spin. Never disassembled before.

fan runs very fast. HW monitor says HD bay 1 is 249C and HD bay 2 is 129C

Any idea what needs to be replaced ?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-5209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fast fan
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-5209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fast fan
threads.message:
HD bay 1 should have a temp sensor.
Strange failure if nobody touched it before,

As no schematics for these machines, may be better to install MacFanSpeed and set the fan to follow CPU temp.
